Name: Demon Toad
Power 2 - Action: immediate (react), when the toad takes damage
Power 2 - Attack: Near burst 1; your level +2 vs. Fortitude
Power 2 - Effect: 1d8 + Charisma modifier poison damage and the target is dazed (save ends).
Power 3 - Effect: At the end of your turn, if the demon toad has not received a command that turn, it attacks or charges the nearest dazed creature, otherwise the nearest creature.

Name: Hopping Imp
Aura: *Curse (Psychic) aura 1:* Each time a creature in the aura misses on an attack, it takes 1d8 + your Charisma modifier psychic damage.
Power 1 - Effect: Target takes 5 persistent poison damage (save ends).
Power 2 - Attack: Near arc 2, your level +4 vs. Fortitude
Power 2 - Effect: 1d8 + Charisma modifier poison damage and the target is slowed (save ends).
Power 3 - Effect: At the end of your turn, if the hopping imp has not received a command that turn, it attacks or charges the nearest slowed creature, otherwise the nearest creature.

Name: Burner Demon
Power 1 - Effect: 1d6 + Charisma modifier fire damage. *Miss:* Random creature adjacent to burner demon takes 1d6 + Charisma modifier fire damage.
Power 2 - Attack: Far burst 1 (range 5), one random target; your level +4 vs. Reflex
Power 2 - Effect: 1d6 + Charisma modifier fire damage.
Power 3 - Effect: At the end of your turn, if the burner demon has not received a command that turn, it makes a *fast flicking fire* attack against the nearest square occupied by a creature.

Name: Hellhound
Power 1 - Effect: 2d6 + Charisma modifier fire damage. *Miss:* Make a *fiery breath* attack as a free action, if available.
Power 2 - Attack: Near arc 2, your level +4 vs. Reflex
Power 2 - Effect: 1d6 + Charisma modifier fire damage and persistent 5 fire damage.
Power 3 - Effect: At the end of your turn, if the hellhound has not received a command that turn, it charges its quarry if within charging distance, otherwise Runs towards the quarry.

Name: Hezrou
Aura: *Demonic Stench aura 1:* Creatures in the aura cannot heal.
Power 1 - Effect: 1d8 + Charisma modifier and the target is grappled.
Power 2 - Effect: A creature the hezrou has grappled takes 2d8 + Charisma modifier damage.
Power 3 - Effect: At the end of your turn, if the hezrou has not received a command that turn, it constricts if it is grappling a creature. Otherwise it attacks or charges the nearest creature.

Name: Hungry Maw
Aura: *Chomp and Chew aura 1:* Targets take 10 persistent damage (save ends).
Power 3 - Effect: At the end of your turn, if the hellhound has not received a command that turn, it charges its quarry if within charging distance, otherwise Runs towards the quarry.

Name: Minor Dream Figment
Power 2 - Action: immediate (react), when a Melee attack hits you
Power 2 - Effect: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage and the target is dazed (save ends).
Power 4 - Effect: At the end of your turn, if the minor dream figment has not received a command that turn, it makes a *pummel* attack against an adjacent enemy.

Name: Vulture Demon
Power 1 - Effect: 1d8 + Charisma modifier damage and 5 persistent poison damage.
Power 2 - Attack: Near arc 3, your level +2 vs. Will
Power 2 - Effect: 1d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage and the target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.
Power 3 - Effect: At the end of your turn, if the vulture demon has not received a command that turn, its *demonic screech* attack is automatically refreshed and then used, positioned to include as many targets as possible.

Name: Big Burner
Power 1 - Effect: 3d6 + Charisma modifier fire damage. *Miss:* Random creature adjacent to big burner takes 2d6 + Charisma modifier fire damage.
Power 2 - Attack: Far burst 1 (range 5), one random target; your level +4 vs. Reflex
Power 2 - Effect: 2d6 + Charisma modifier fire damage.
Power 3 - Effect: At the end of your turn, if the big burner has not received a command that turn, it makes a *fast flicking fire* attack against the nearest square occupied by a creature.

Name: Boar Demon (Nalfeshnee)
Power 2 - Attack: Near arc 2; your level +4 vs. Reflex
Power 2 - Effect: 1d8 + Charisma modifier necrotic and lightning damage and the target is weakened until the end of your next turn.
Power 3 - Effect: When the boar demon is reduced to 0 HP or below, it is destroyed. *Secondary Attack:* Near burst 2; your level +4 vs. Reflex; the target is pushed 2 and dazed (save ends)
Power 4 - Effect: At the end of your turn, if the boar demon has not received a command that turn, it falls to 0 HP and triggers *horror nimbus*.

Name: Frenzy Demon
Aura: *Aura of Frustration aura 3:* Each time a creature within the aura misses on an attack roll, the frenzy demon gets a +2 bonus to its next attack roll.
Power 2 - Effect: 2d12 + Charisma modifier damage.
Power 3 - Effect: At the end of your turn, if the frenzy demon has not received a command that turn, it moves towards the nearest creature and uses *raking claws*.

Name: Pincer Demon (Glabrezu)
Power 2 - Effect: 1d10 + Charisma modifier force damage and the target falls prone.
Power 3 - Effect: At the end of your turn, if the pincer demon has not received a command that turn, it uses *chaos hammer* centered on you, if possible. Otherwise, it moves towards the nearest creature and uses *pincer*.

Name: Laughing Demon
Aura: *Aura of Mockery aura 3:* A creature within the aura that fails a saving throw takes 15 damage.
Power 1 - Effect: 2d8 + Charisma modifier damage, and a creature adjacent to the target takes 1d8 + Charisma modifier damage.
Power 2 - Effect: Make two *tooth and claw* attacks.
Power 3 - Effect: At the end of your turn, if the laughing demon has not received a command that turn, it teleports to an unoccupied square adjacent to a random creature within 20, and uses *tooth and claw and stomp*.

Name: Balor
Aura: *Aura of Flame (Fire) aura 2:* A creature that enters or begins its turn in the aura takes 20 fire damage.
Power 1 - Effect: 2d12 + Charisma modifier fire and necrotic damage.
Power 2 - Effect: The target is knocked prone and pulled 3.
Power 3 - Effect: If a creature is killed within the balor's aura, the balor's summoner regains a recovery and the balor heals equal to your recovery value.
Power 4 - Effect: When the balor is reduced to 0 HP or below, it is destroyed. All creatures within 5 take 2d12 + your Charisma modifier radiant damage.
Power 5 - Effect: At the end of your turn, if the balor has not received a command that turn, it moves so the nearest creature is in range of its *flame whip*, then uses the *flame whip* and *longsword*.

Name: Marilith
Aura: *Wall of Steel aura 2:* A creature that leaves the aura takes 15 damage.
Power 2 - Effect: Make three *sword* attacks, each against a different target. Shift 1 between attacks.
Power 3 - Effect: For the rest of this turn, all attacks you make score a critical hit on a natural 15-20.
Power 5 - Effect: At the end of your turn, if the marilith has not received a command that turn, it uses *three whirling swords* against an adjacent target. If there is no such target, it uses *beguiling gaze*.

Name: Ape/Yeti
Power 2 - Effect: 1d8 + your level damage.
Skills: Athletics +8 + half your level, Intimidate +5 + half your level

Name: Bear/Giant Badger/Wolverine/Owlbear
Power 2 - Effect: The animal companion starts each battle with temporary hit points equal to double its level.
Skills: Endure +7 + half your level, Intimidate +5 + half your level

Name: Blink Dog
Power 2 - Effect: After the animal companion is hit by an attack, and the attack is fully resolved, it can teleport 2.

Name: Boar/Buffalo/Bull/Yak
Power 2 - Effect: +1 attack bonus on a charge.
Skills: Endure +6 + half your level, Nature +7 + half your level

Name: Giant Bird of Prey (Hawk, Eagle, Owl, Vulture, Falcon)
Skills: Perception +7 + half your level, Stealth +6 + half your level

Name: Giant Lizard (Cave Gecko, Giant Anole, Giant Iguana)
Skills: Athletics +7 + half your level, Stealth +6 + half your level

Name: Giant Snake/Giant Spider/Giant Toad
Power 2 - Effect: The animal companion's opportunity attacks also do 2 persistent poison damage (save ends). *Level 11:* 4 persistent poison damage. *Level 21:* 6 persistent poison damage.

Name: Giant Spider/Chameleon
Power 2 - Effect: 1d8 + your level and pull 1.
Skills: Athletics +7 + half your level, Stealth +6 + half your level

Name: Hound/Coyote/Jackal/Hyena/Wolf
Power 2 - Effect: The animal companion does +2 damage when it has combat advantage against the target. *Level 11:* +4. *Level 21:* +6.
Skills: Endure +8 + half your level, Nature +6 + half your level

Name: Panther/Tiger/Lion
Power 2 - Effect: On the first round of battle, the animal companion has combat advantage against any creature that has not yet acted.
Skills: Athletics +7 + half your level, Stealth +6 + half your level
